title: An Obedient for Samharin
description: An Obedient for Samharin Reese Gabriel "Book 7 in the More Than Male series." Deyna is an obedient, born and bred to serve a primale Master. Samharin is a mem, the first of his kind to join the Guardians. He has vowed to make Deyna his own, even as he seeks to protect the galaxy from an unprecedented alien threat. Can she resist his masculine powers or will she yield to him as slave? Samharin's help comes from an unlikely quarter, the Narthian freedom fighter known as Abe. Together they must do the impossible and unite Earthlings and Narthians to overcome the mysterious alien Queen. With the help of Nyssa, Theron, Reeva and Vandar it will be a showdown like no other, one that will change the shape of the universe forever. In the end, however, it will come down to the love of one woman, Deyna, and her loving dominant Samharin.
author: Reese Gabriel
